desc: We are a custom T-Shirt Print on Demand Company. We do custom designs, logos, pictures and more! Just send us your design and we will print it on the shirt of your choice in color and size! Embroidery coming soon as well!

layout.text: Welcome To Foxy Twist - "The #1 Print On Demand Store!"
Best Prices On All Custom Printing Shirts and Tumblers! Embroidery Stitching For Shirts & Caps Coming Soon!!
